name: TeddyNightmare
description:
Teddy nightmare is a horror point-and-click game , you must survive 7 nightmare with  different ennemy .

  • Blender 2.82 (eevee)
  • paint.net
  • click team fusion 2.5
  • audacity

You have found a new cure for an illness and have injected it to you to see the effectiveness but everything does not seem to go as planned, this product has plunged you into an infinite coma and it even merges with all your phobia of plus this one even has side effect that only lasts overnight.

  • 7 level
  • ennemy different every level
  • cinematic
  • creepy ambience
  • voice actor
